verses.name: Mark 8:6
verses.text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground: and he took the seven loaves, and gave thanks, and brake, and gave to his disciples to set before them; and they did set them before the people.

verses.name: Mark 8:7
verses.text: And they had a few small fishes: and he blessed, and commanded to set them also before them.

verses.name: Mark 8:8
verses.text: So they did eat, and were filled: and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets.

verses.name: Mark 8:9
verses.text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand: and he sent them away.
